attributes.action: police to have the power to stop & search, give a reason but not justification
attributes.background: For police & those in authority to stop and search those that they believe to be suspicious, I believe that you should provide a reason but not have to justify. I believe that this would improve our safety and give police the respect and authority they deserve to look after the community

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "give a reason but not justification". 

You can find out more about stop and search powers here: 

https://www.gov.uk/police-powers-to-stop-and-search-your-rights

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
